title: sold: 1950's JJK Copyart PC Jackie Robinson
author: yanksfan09

posts.post_title: sold: 1950's JJK Copyart PC Jackie Robinson
posts.post_content:
For sale 1950's JJK Copyart photos Postcard of Jackie Robinson.

SGC didn't slab I'm assuming because it appears factory miscut. Left side is cut on an angle. A bit of creasing but overall image presents very nicely.
Great looking period and less common Jackie issue that doesn't break the bank. 

pending.... shipped no fee method. check preferred. PM

Thanks
